channel.title: Secondary Offering on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Secondary Offering on FinanClub

item.title: VRT
item.description: score:1092 Chances: Vertiv Holdings Co announced an underwritten secondary offering of its Class A common stock, indicating potential investor interest and capital infusion. Strong demand for data center equipment, driven by cloud and colocation markets, has contributed to Vertiv’s stock rise, with positive full-year earnings guidance updates.
